foreignData.name: Konsulats-Überwachung
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Konsulats-Überwachung ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du {E}{E}{E}{E} (vier Energiemarken).
Bezahle {E}{E}: Verhindere allen Schaden, der dir in diesem Zug von einer Quelle, die du bestimmst, zugefügt würde.

foreignData.name: Vigilancia del Consulado
foreignData.text:
Cuando la Vigilancia del Consulado entre al campo de batalla, obtienes {E}{E}{E}{E} (cuatro contadores de energía).
Pagar {E}{E}: Prevén todo el daño que la fuente de tu elección fuera a hacerte este turno.

foreignData.name: Surveillance du consulat
foreignData.text:
Quand la Surveillance du consulat arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez {E}{E}{E}{E} (quatre marqueurs « énergie »).
Payez {E}{E} : Prévenez toutes les blessures qui devraient vous être infligées ce tour-ci par une source de votre choix.

foreignData.name: Sorveglianza del Consolato
foreignData.text:
Quando la Sorveglianza del Consolato entra nel campo di battaglia, ottieni {E}{E}{E}{E} (quattro segnalini energia).
Paga {E}{E}: Previeni tutto il danno che ti verrebbe inflitto in questo turno da una fonte a tua scelta.

foreignData.name: 領事府の看視
foreignData.text:
領事府の看視が戦場に出たとき、あなたは{E}{E}{E}{E}（エネルギー・カウンター４個）を得る。
{E}{E}を支払う：このターン、あなたが選んだ発生源１つからあなたに与えられるすべてのダメージを軽減する。

foreignData.name: 영사관 감시체계
foreignData.text:
영사관 감시체계가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 {E}{E}{E}{E}(에너지 카운터 네 개)를 얻는다.
{E}{E}를 지불한다: 당신이 선택한 원천이 이 턴에 당신에게 입히려는 모든 피해를 방지한다.

foreignData.name: Vigilância do Consulado
foreignData.text:
Quando Vigilância do Consulado entra no campo de batalha, você recebe {E}{E}{E}{E} (quatro marcadores de energia).
Pague {E}{E}: Previna todo o dano que seria causado a você neste turno por uma fonte a sua escolha.

foreignData.name: Консульская Слежка
foreignData.text:
Когда Консульская Слежка выходит на поле битвы, вы получаете {E}{E}{E}{E} (четыре жетона энергии).
Заплатите {E}{E}: предотвратите все повреждения, которые должны быть нанесены вам в этом ходу источником по вашему выбору.

foreignData.name: 执政监视网
foreignData.text:
当执政监视网进战场时，你得到{E}{E}{E}{E}（四个能量指示物）。
支付{E}{E}：选择一个来源。于本回合中，防止该来源将对你造成的所有伤害。

foreignData.name: 執政監視網
foreignData.text:
當執政監視網進戰場時，你得到{E}{E}{E}{E}（四個能量指示物）。
支付{E}{E}：選擇一個來源。於本回合中，防止該來源將對你造成的所有傷害。

name: Consulate Surveillance
originalText:
When Consulate Surveillance enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice.

rulings.text: If the chosen source would deal damage to you and one or more other players or permanents, only the damage that would be dealt to you is prevented.
If multiple prevention and/or replacement effects are trying to apply to the same damage, the player who would be dealt damage chooses the order in which to apply them.
Consulate Surveillance's second ability doesn't target anything. You choose a source of damage as it resolves.
You can't pay more energy counters than you have.
Keep careful track of how many energy counters each player has. You may do so by keeping a running count on paper, by using a die, or by any other clear and mutually agreeable method.

If an effect says you get one or more {E}, you get that many energy counters. To pay one or more {E}, you lose that many energy counters. Any effects that interact with counters a player gets, has, or loses can interact with energy counters.
Energy counters aren't mana. They don't go away as steps, phases, and turns end, and effects that add mana “of any type” to your mana pool can't give you energy counters.
{E} is the energy symbol. It represents one energy counter.
Energy counters are a kind of counter that a player may have. They're not associated with specific permanents. (Other kinds of counters that players may have include poison and experience.)

text:
When Consulate Surveillance enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice.
